Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: ‘Jaws dropped,’ Jim Baker, a consultant for a state public safety enhancement initiative, recounted at a recent public meeting.

Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: ‘The 20 people that are consuming a lot of resources clearly need some, but they’re not getting the right ones,’ Brattleboro Assistant Police Chief Jeremy Evans recently told the town selectboard.
Named Person Sources.Source Justification: Brattleboro Assistant Police Chief Jeremy Evans recently told the town selectboard.

Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: ‘Compared to communities your size, you are consistently higher,’ Baker, former commander of the Vermont State Police and one-time Rutland City police chief, recently told local leaders of their figures.
Named Person Sources.Title of Source: former commander of the Vermont State Police and one-time Rutland City police chief
Named Person Sources.Source Justification: Baker, former commander of the Vermont State Police and one-time Rutland City police chief, recently told local leaders of their figures.

Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: ‘The disorder we are witnessing, especially in our downtown area, has many causes and impacts,’ Evans wrote the selectboard in a recent memorandum.
Named Person Sources.Source Justification: Evans wrote the selectboard in a recent memorandum.

Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: ‘You have a lot of people looking for help,’ Evans said, ‘but there’s a small percentage that, for whatever reason, are unable or unwilling to accept it.’
‘Unfortunately, many of those are providers,’ Evans said, ‘which creates a huge, huge problem.’
‘This is something that we see in a lot of different jurisdictions,’ Robin Joy, the Crime Research Group’s statistical director, told local leaders at another meeting.
Named Person Sources.Source Justification: Robin Joy, the Crime Research Group’s statistical director, told local leaders at another meeting.

Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: ‘This is where the community service providers can really help,’ she said of the latter percentage.
Named Person Sources.Source Justification: Robin Joy, the Crime Research Group’s statistical director, said of the latter percentage.

Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: ‘But that’s challenging when ‘the No. 1 thing’ the top 20 people are arrested for is trespassing at those places, the researcher added.
